main event: A civilian observed one round white object with a streamer flying high in the sky in Medford, Oregon on December 6, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed for about five seconds,The object was traveling north at a high altitude,The report concluded that the sighting was likely caused by a meteor,Pilot observation was noted from a flight at 15,000 feet,The report was part of the Project Blue Book UFO investigation.
sighted object: one round white object with streamer
